title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon facts for kids
snippet: In 1976, Mélenchon joined the Socialist Party. He quickly became involved in local politics. He was elected as a town councillor in Massy in 1983. In 1986, he was elected to the Senate, the upper house of the French parliament.

title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon
snippet: Mélenchon joined the Parti Socialiste (PS) in 1976 at the age of 24, transitioning from prior Trotskyist affiliations to embed himself within François Mitterrand's emerging leadership circle.[22] He aligned closely with the party's left wing, ...
